p: The study provides insight which may be helpful to the future planning and preparedness of trials not only to a potential second wave of COVID-19 but also to other local and national infectious disease outbreaks. The survey focused on the key aspects of trial activity for CTIMPs; namely, recruitment, follow up and IMP management. This allowed us to assess specifically the type of trial activity impacted by the novel health emergency. The study was conducted in a subgroup of people who are listed as 'high clinical risk' by UK government officials. Therefore, the CTIMPs surveyed would encompass those who are most likely to be impacted by the pandemic.
